name: @sassoftware/viya-servers
description: app and api server for SAS Viya user applications

scripts.buildall: npm run core:build && npm run appjs:build && npm run apijs:build
scripts.core:pub: cd packages/viya-server-core  &&  npm publish  --tag dbg --access public
scripts.appjs:pub: cd packages/viya-appserverjs && npm publish --tag dbg --access public
scripts.apijs:pub: cd packages/viya-apiserverjs && npm publish --tag dbg --access public
scripts.create:pub: cd packages/create-viya-api && npm publish --tag dbg --access public
scripts.base:pub: cd packages/viya-api-base     && npm  publish --tag dbg --access public
scripts.puball: npm run core:pub && npm run appjs:pub && npm run apijs:pub && npm run create:pub && npm run base:pub
scripts.pub: npm run core:pub && npm run appjs:pub && npm run apijs:pub

author: Deva Kumar
